high_descs: Turn around and walk across the room, then turn right and take one step, then turn left and take one step, then turn right and walk to the bed.
Pick up the purple pillow at the edge of the bed.
Turn to the left to face the desk.
anns.task_desc: Look at the pillow in the light.

high_descs: Turn right and walk to the chair then turn right and walk to the bed then take a step to your left.
Pick up the purple pillow that's in front of you.
Turn left to face the light on the desk.
Turn on the light that's on the desk.
anns.task_desc: Inspect a pillow by lamp light.

high_descs: Turn right, walk to the desk, turn right, and walk to the bed.
Turn left to face the desk.
anns.task_desc: Examine a pillow under the lamp.
